channel.title: LSE:LSEG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:LSEG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: LSE Group Starts Blockchain Platform for Access by Private Funds
item.description: London Stock Exchange Group Plc has rolled out a blockchain-based platform initially focused on private funds, marking a push by the bourse operator into digital assets.
